section.p: Select File -> Accounts _fixme_ [ui] from the StudDB main menu to open the accounts management window. This command is only available when you are logged in as Admin ( ). Here you can manage accounts of users that are authorised to modify the database.
section.note: Admin account can not be deleted as this will preclude many essential operations that can only be performed by the administrator.

You can create user accounts with empty passwords or change passwords of existing account(s) to an empty value if it is absolutely necessary to do so. However, we strongly discourage you from such practices for security reasons.
